Test i monials

Few Words From Our Satisfied Clients

Michael Boussias

- Owner | Publisher , at Boussias Communications

We started using conferience.com at our first conference and we got enthusiastic reviews by the event delegates. Conferience.com has a new style in the way the participants interact with the speakers of our conferences. They ask questions through the web-app, anonymously or not, the most popular questions appear to everybody and the conversation gets a new approach and becomes more interesting! Even foreign speakers have given very positive reviews about the interesting questions that are uploaded during their presentations. The agenda is always updated with full details of the panels and the speakers. In the future, all other features of the platform, such as speaker evaluation or the raffle and participation option, are going to add value to the conferences of Boussias Communications.

Steve Clarke

- Sales Mentor, Author, , Inspirational Business Speaker

I am very impressed by the web-app "Conferience" a great way to interact with an audience. I will definitely use this at future conferences

Iakovos Giannaklis

- Head of Branch Network , Eurobank

Conferience provided an innovative and cost-effective solution to attracting questions and ideas from the participants in a number of internal meetings of our organization. Users were able to easily understand the navigation and functionality of the system and they greatly appreciated the anonymity provided and the fact that they could raise questions to issues that were discussed in real time.

Dimitris Georgopoulos

- Partner at Rethink Business Lab. , Business Development Advisor & Executive Coach

I tested “Conferience”, for the first time at a summit about customer service, where I had the responsibility of coordinating with demanding high-level participants and panels with first class executives. “Conferience” made the difference! Helped tremendously in preparation of the content and the questions, but more important was the high increase of the interaction with participants surpassing the 90%. Needless to mention that an overall assessment of the summit was “excellent”. Since then, I use “Conferience” to any seminar, conference, summit, and workshop. For me is a valuable tool that helps me both in organization and in effective coordination and communication with participants. Important is the continuous support provided to the product, in order to adapt specific needs, frequently upgraded with new features. I strongly recommend “Conferience”, adds value and makes the difference!

Angelina Michaelidis

- General Manager , Response International S.A.

Conferience is an interactive tool that adds value to the time I devote for business conferences. The use of Conferience.com started as an exploration, smoothly, using its fantastic, very handy user-interface. Soon after, I was attracted by the different features, the power I acquire in my hands expressing my view and make my questions shared with the rest of the audience. From now on, I definitely prefer to attend conferences, if Conferience is available.

Konstantinos Ouzounis

- CEO , Ethos Media S.A.

Conferience has proved an innovative and also smart application, as it allows interaction among the speakers and the participants of our conferences. However, what really makes it stand out, is how accurately it responds to our needs. In a world where computer science and technology are advancing and evolving at great speed, Conferience gives us the opportunity to welcome our audience to a “new dimension”, where attending a conference has ceased to be a “passive” process, as the participants are enabled to ask questions and to evaluate the speeches as well as the conference as a whole in real time. This is a tool which has given a unique “note” to our conferences. Thank you for adding value to our conferences.

Michael R. Virardi

- Trainer | Speaker | Author ,

Conferience was not what I was waiting for to be developed. Conferience was what I needed to be developed!

Antonis Kotzamanidis

- Managing Director , Entersoft S.A.

We have used the Conferience service in an internal personnel meeting for the first time this year. It actually proved to be a new interactive experience for the participants, both in posing questions and in specific polls which took place during the meeting. It performed beyond our expectations, as it helped to collect essential feedback from participants and made presentations more pleasant. I strongly recommend it and we will definitely use it again in future events.

Isavella Vitou

- Group Transformation Sector, Group Strategy , Eurobank Ergasias SA

Conferience is an innovative and very user-friendly application. The competitive advantage of Conferience is that it can be accessed easily and quickly by any smart phone device that is connected to the internet. For this reason, this web application is an extremely helpful tool for the coordinators, speakers and guests since you get real time feedback and questions. If I had to describe Conferience with few key words I would say: fast, interactive, flexible, easy to use, innovative. Thank you very much for this new experience.

Marios Koumis

- Premier & Advance Propositions Manager , Customer Value Management, RBWM | HSBC Bank Plc

This year's Wealth Management Forum was outstanding! Panel participants were all excellent, as their experience and in-depth knowledge of the business kept the audience 100% focused. The interactive real- time survey through Conferience kept the interest alive throughout the event and discussions/presentations provided useful insights to the audience. Congratulations!

George Diakonikolaou Ph.D

- PMP, Project Coach. ,

Conferience is an excellent web-app, which enables you to directly and easily interact with the attendees of a conference or a training course - whether it is long or short. Apart from the incredible ability and the real time communication, the platform gives the possibility to the organizer of the event to easily create an event on his/her own. My personal experience with this platform at the event organization, as well at its use, is one of the most ideal of an IT tool; it concentrates on the event itself, on the interaction and the comments of the attendees, and not on technical complexity. In just one word, it is "effective".

Vassilios P. Bartzokas

- CEO / Founder Archisearch.gr , Organizer/Producer Esw [éso ] Conference

Conferience events platform revolutionizes the way attendees and event organizers share information, ideas and questions. Through their smartphones, our attendees were engaged by asking questions, rating speakers, providing feedback to the event organizers giving a new dimension to our event. Our audience enjoyed the use of Conferience and we will implement it to all our events

Sotiris Sirmakezis

- General Manager, Group Chief Digital & Technology Officer , Eurobank

Conferience is an innovative web app solution bringing a totally new dimension in a corporate meeting. The easiness of using it provided us a great help to collect ideas, feedback and outlooks from our executives. The features of agenda, questions, polling with live graphs, evaluation, feedback and raffle engaged us to a more than creative way giving a unique experience!

Babis Divaris

- Tax partner , ITAS PC

Conferience gives to audience the role of active participants. Using Conferience, each participant can easily vote, make questions or intervene with other ways. The application is very easy to understand and friendly to use. The only device we need is a smartphone!

Athina Kylafi

- Communications Manager , Corporate Communications, BASF Hellas S.A.

Conferience is an excellent, user friendly, easy to use tool. I think it could turn a conference, meeting or other event into a unique experience.

Theodore Krintas

- Managing Director , Attica Wealth Management - Greece

Conferience.com is a must in every conference. Live interaction with delegates creates a flawless experience for all!

Maria Papacosta

- Managing Director , Happy Creations

Working with Conferience has enabled us to provide a greater level of interaction for our clients’ meetings and events. Its ease of use and limitless possibilities have turned it into a tool for us that we can use from a simple fun game to a more sophisticated poll. Thank you for the great service and continuous support!

Giannis Tsiliras

- Consumer CRM & Channel Management Director , OTE and COSMOTE

Conferience has been an important asset to our internal workshops and conferences over the past year. It changed the way we interact with our people as we experienced even more engagement, participation and productive dialogue. The system is easy to use, flexible and robust. The web-app interface offers a wide range of capabilities such as real time questions, surveys, quizzes and evaluations, simplifying and amplifying the process of feedback, hence facilitating the evaluation and the innovative approaches to address key business challenges. I highly recommend this solution for conferences and corporate workshops/meetings.

Jason Nathan

- Global Multi-Channel Capability Director , dunnhumby

Just wanted to say how effective and professional I found the Conferience system used at Shopper ID Conference 2014 event in Athens. Everything worked very smoothly, and I was particularly impressed by the questions/voting mechanic, which I had not seen before. It really helped me maximise the value of my Q&A session and that seemed to be the case for all the speakers as well.

George Zalokostas

- Country Media Manage , Unilever - Greece & Cyprus

Conferience is a great platform for managing the Q&A session in a conference. It is very easy to use, both for the administrator and for the participants. During our workshop, it encouraged the participation of the audience both by giving them the opportunity to enter questions and to vote for the ones that they found most interesting. At the same time, it enabled us (the organizers) to capture all questions, manage them according to their relevance to the Workshop's topic and prioritize them, based on likes, thus, manage efficiently the timing of the Q&A session. Additionally, the ex post full question report we received was very useful. In our next conferences, we intend to make use of Conferience’s Event Evaluation feature, in order to get constructive feedback avoiding printed evaluation forms.

Panos Milias

- Digital Media Manager , Nestle Hellas SA

Conferience was a great experience in our event. It was very well-received that managed to engage and motivate our audience to make questions. I would definitely suggest it in internal events, as many colleagues do not have the courage to make a question orally. Additionally, the audience has the opportunity to check what is being asked, vote in case someone has the same question and think what else could be asked. Then, the dialogue begins!!!

John Kyriopoulos

- Professor Emeritus of Health Economics , National School of Public Health

The "Conferience" was used at the 13th Healthworld Conference for televoting needs among several participants. I consider that the features and tools of this application are user-friendly and suitable for constructing and eventually conducting an interactive assessment in real time and with great success. I strongly recommend it.

Anna Gousiou

- Product Manager, Diabetes Business Unit , Novo Nordisk Ltd.

The service provided by Conferience was of high quality, adding value and contributing to the success of our satellite symposium. Both the audience and the speakers positively evaluated the televoting system as a simple and valuable tool that made the event interactive and interesting. We look forward to our next cooperation!

Mary Georgiadou

- Chairman of the Executive Committee , Hellenic Institute of Human Resources Management

On 6th of November 2014, the Hellenic Institute of Human Resources Management of the Hellenic Management Association organized its 5th Annual Conference under the title "The Big HR Debate - HR Reloading". The Organizing Committee of the Conference, decided to use for the first time the innovative application of Conferience.
With the use of Conferience, the participants of our conference were excited to be able to actively participate throughout the various sessions of the conference by simply using their smart devices.
We will definitely use Conferience in other events and conferences in the future.

Konstantinos Tsiptsis

- CRM & Customer Intelligence Manager , Eurobank

We had the opportunity to use Conferience in the framework of an internal workshop on campaign management. More than fifty participants had the opportunity to submit questions and rank them according to their preferences. Conferience managed not only to increase the number of questions through anonymity, but also to add some fun by the use of the ‘Like’ option to everyone else’s questions.

Diana Engelbrecht

- Marketing Manager , at Digital Ship

Using conferience.com added a new level of engagement between our speakers and audience. We received positive feedback from our enthusiastic users. Having the option to update the agenda on site was an advantage when sessions ran late, and the program was moved around to accommodate the changes. The system is easy to use, and the support team is very helpful and friendly.

Panagiotis Tsantilas

- Marketing Manager , Training Center Coordinator SEE, ME, SA, Africa Knauf Hellas

We decided to use Conferience for the first time during our 25 years ceremony convention organized for our key partners. Conferience proved to be a pleasant experience for us and an elegant, friendly user tool for the users that managed to deliver what initially has been promised. Conferience team high level support was continuous throughout the entire event keeping all of us reluctant and secure for the final result. We look forward to using Conferience into similar projects in the future.

Theofanis Giotis, MSc, Ph.D. C., PMP, CSM, CSP

- CEO of 12PM Consulting (ITEC Consulting) , 1988-now

On every event your run worldwide, training or conference, you have a single issue: How to handle participants’ questions? Conferience gives a perfect solution to this single issue. Conferience is an easy to use web application that anyone can use in seconds. Participants can directly and easily interact with the organizers giving them the opportunity and ability to interact in a real time environment. My personal experience with this platform during the Project Management Conference 2014 ( www.pmconference.gr ) was excellent. A must use tool for all events!!!

Nick Androulakis

- Logistics Coordinator , IEEE ECE 360

Conferience gave us what we were looking for and upgraded our event to the next level. We broke down the walls between our panel and our audience! The feedback we got through the app was a nice feature we used it afterwards for our self-evaluation!

Georgios Sokolakis

- Commercial Sales Manager , Frezyderm S.A.

The first time I used Conferience was in December 2015, during a training program for the sales department of Frezyderm, where I work as a commercial manager. Since the idea of innovation is inextricably linked with Frezyderm, I am constantly searching for programs, techniques and ideas that will contribute to improving the organization and achieving a better function and training of the sales department. Choosing Conferience in order to train the sales department proved to be excellent. It justly met the demands I had set. The training of a department that consists of many people is demanding and usually difficult, which means that we have to overcome any difficulties by finding the adequate tools or successful ways to do so. Conferience passed the test! Except for the fact that it impressed the participants, it managed to improve the training as far as time, participation, results and conclusions are concerned. The ability it provided when carrying out statistical results in reference to the training, as well as individual performance of the participants, gave us feedback to use during the next training cycle. The use of back office was easy after the support and help I had from the Conferience team. The support was excellent and ready to provide solutions. I will definitely use Conferience again in the next training cycle or conference!

Agathi Pafili

- Senior Regulatory Policy Advisor , European Fund and Asset Management Association (EFAMA)

Conferience is a great tool that allows a true interaction between speakers and audience in a fast, easy and efficient way. It allows the right questions to be put on the table and an exchange of views with as many of the participants wish to raise their voice. It therefore makes a conference more lively and interesting to everyone.

SEN/JA

- Alumni Greece ,

We tested Conferience in one of our events and now we are trying to use it in every single one! It can turn a good experience into an amazing one by simply adding the parameter of interaction. More than 80% of the attendees used it and the result was amazing. Questions didn't seem to end, hearing even the shyest attendees' opinion and the results of the pols gave us important feedback for further actions. Undoubtedly it is going to become a must for every informal, social or business event organized in the future.

Marianna Kalendi

- General Secretariat , Digital Policy | Ministry of Digital Policy, Telecommunications & Media

The platform contributed significantly to the success of our event and the collection of the participants’ questions ran smoothly before as well as during the course of the event.

Christiana Koudigkeli

- Logistics Coordinator , Job Fair Athens 2015

Conferience definitely brought our event and our Q&A sessions to the next level. We used it to bring together our audience and the speakers in a more interactive and modern way. It was the second year in a row that we decided to get involved with Conferience and the feedback we received from the users helped us reevaluate our agenda and gave us valuable ideas that we’ll try to implement next year. The platform is user-friendly and innovating. We would strongly suggest it for similar panels and events.

Christi Mousioni

- Sales Institute in Greece , Operations Manager

Conferience is an interactive and helpful event app for the participants and administrators. I would like to thank the Conferience team for the great support!

Vasileios Gongolidis

- General Secretariat for Research & Technology , Member of the organizing committee of the 2nd Technology Forum 2015

The web application Conferience made it easier for the moderators of the various sessions to interact with the audience through their smartphones and evaluate the speakers as well as the whole event. Additionally, the report we received after the conclusion of the event was very useful. The organizing committee considers using Conferience on a permanent basis for future events. The 2nd Technology Forum was co organized by the Association of Information Technology Companies of Northern Greece, Centre for Research and Technology-Hellas, Greek International Business Association, Federation of Industries of Northern Greece, Aristotle University, University of Macedonia, under the auspices of Alexander Innovation Zone, General Secretariat for Research & Technology and International Hellenic University. The purpose of the Forum was to promote new technologies as well as synergies between enterprises and academic/research institutions on the ICT sector.

Renata Papadimitriou

- Managing Director , The PR Corp.

Conferience was chosen to be the element that will convert our client’s meeting to an open channel of communication among the presenter and the audience within the room and the one attending remotely! Goal achieved 100% providing optimum feedback!

Thanos Paraschos

- Founder of Youth Entrepreneurship Club , CEO of iprovidenow Ltd

We used Conferience during Pan-European Startup Europe Week event 2016 in Chania-Crete, which was held simultaneously in 40 countries and 200+ cities in Europe, and it was the first big -scale event to be organized by Youth Entrepreneurship Club as an ambassador! The pressure to achieve an organization of high quality was intense. Given the theme of our event, we chose Conferience as an example of a successful Startup and we were not disappointed. On the contrary, Conferience confirmed its reputation and exceeded our expectations.Its usage was simple and easy, it contributed to the overall experience of our audience who were able to conveniently place questions and remarks without the stress of verbal communication or interrupting the flow of discussion. Through a democratic procedure, the best question was voted to finally be addressed to the speakers, promoting the conversation. Conferience team was 100% alert and supportive to provide any guidance we needed, and the platform responded excellently during the discussion as well as during the evaluation of the event and the polls in the startup pitching contest. In the end we were able to quickly receive poll results, analytic infographics, as well as exported data and statistics, yielding valuable information about audience engagement and feedback. Conferience majorly enhanced satisfaction and overall success of our event, impressing our audience and providing useful tools to calculate variables of this success. It has been a problem solver. Using Conferience in the future for similar events, is recommended and for us, it is a given.

Timo Lahnalampi

- Senior Consultant , Giulia Pastor, Consultant

We found the Conferience tool very useful, especially for creating interactivity and asking questions in an event with a very tight timeline. The response from the audience was positive: a lot of questions were asked via the tool providing a good basis for the Q&A part of the session and creating a positive feedback for us

Paul Hourlias

- Marketing & Tech Manager at Youth Entrepreneurship Club ,

After the successful Startup Europe Week, we organized in Chania, Crete last year, this year we decided to level up organizing it in Chania as well as in Heraklion and Rethymnon. Knowing that, especially in these big-scale events, there is a gap between the audience and the speakers, we decided to use the features of Conferience to bridge it. Having used Conferience last year we found out that all the features were renewed, and the new interface was even more simplified. Apart from that, the questions feature was the highlight of them all, impressing all of the speakers along with the audience which was able to make anonymous questions without any hassle at all. The majority of the audience used it and the results were truly amazing. It gave the event an extraordinary spark setting it apart from others. The questions feature also has the democratic option of liking questions, so the top ones can be answered first. Inasmuch as this year Startup Europe Week Crete 2017 was a chain of events throughout the week the event evaluation feature that is provided through Conferience was certainly very helpful. At the end of the event we could take a look at the responses the audience left and correct some potential mistakes for the next event. The same thing could be done with the event report that the Conferience team instantly sent us. The team was extremely helpful and responsive and could provide us with any information needed. Using Conferience in Startup Europe Week Crete 2017 was undoubtedly very helpful for us and is recommended for similar events.

Fotis Fotopoulos

- President of the Board of the Panhellenic Association of Translators ,

Conferience provided us with the necessary tools to boost interaction between the speakers and the audience and meet the fundamental goals of our conference, which were true engagement and communication.

Sofia Cruickshank

- Business Administrator , Next Level Information Ltd

Conferience allowed us to move away from a traditional printed event guide and enabled our attendees to interact with speakers anonymously or not, participate in workshops & sessions, vote on polls, view the attendees’ list/agenda/speaker profiles/sponsor profiles and receive important announcements. The support leading up to and throughout the event was extremely responsive and professional, the team made the impossible possible by creating new features within the app to fulfil our needs! Most importantly, we were able to make amendments to any content from the back office seamlessly and our attendees found the app very user-friendly. We will definitely use Conferience for future events of the same model.

Olympia Kokka

- Executive Director , Youth Entrepreneurship Club

It was the third year in a row that we used the Conferience during the Pan-European Conference Startup Europe Week Crete that was held in 4 different cities. Every year we are impressed with the features added such as attendees networking, speakers’ evaluation and event evaluation which is a valuable feedback. It's a great tool that engages the audience and upgrades the level of a conference. We will definitely use it in our next events.

Ioannis Nikolaou

- Associate Professor of Organizational Behaviour, Work & Organizational Psychologist , Athens University of Economics and Business

Conferience has been our main partner during the two recent Human Resource Management Conferences we organize every two years here at the Athens University of economics and Business. Conferience team has been really professional, very responsive, dealing effectively, accurately and efficiently with all our requests, even under very limited (if any at all) time. Conferience is a very good solution for any kind of meetings and conferences providing high quality services and solutions.

Fotis Psarros

- Allergologist , Secretary General of 12th Panhellenic Congress of Allergy and Clinical Immunology

We decided to use the "Conferience" application during the 12th Panhellenic Congress of Allergy and Clinical Immunology, which was held at the Megaron, the Athens concert hall, from the 29th of March until the 1st of April 2018. The conventional medical conference was converted into an interactive, exciting, event due to the app. There was a keen interest in debate sessions and questions from the audience. On behalf of the Conference President, the Board of Directors of the Hellenic Society of Allergy and Clinical Immunology and all participants, I would like to express our genuine thanks to the "Conferience" team for their contribution to such a successful conference.

Nerina Komioti

- Director General , Hellenic Advertisers, Association (SDE)

Conferience is a great platform for managing the Q&A session in a conference. It is very easy to use, both for the administrator and for the participants. During our workshop, it encouraged the participation of the audience both by giving them the opportunity to enter questions and to vote for the ones that they found most interesting. At the same time, it enabled us (the organizers) to capture all questions, manage them according to their relevance to the Workshop's topic and prioritize them, based on likes, thus, manage efficiently the timing of the Q&A session. Additionally, the ex post full question report we received was very useful. In our next conferences, we intend to make use of Conferience’s Event Evaluation feature, in order to get constructive feedback avoiding printed evaluation forms.

Konstantinos Kallinteris

- Project Curator of PharmACon (Pharmaceutical Athenian Congress) ,

Conferience was the most pioneering application in our congress. First and foremost, Conferience provided participants the opportunity to submit their questions, assess speakers’ performance and be informed about our agenda and sponsors. In particular, this innovative web app enriched our congress and contributed to the immediate interaction between attendees and our team. In other words, it was conducive to the improvement of our plan during the event and it enhanced the development of our social network. The support was excellent and ready to provide solutions. All things considered, Conferience was tailored to our needs and we are going to use it again in the future

Alexandra Lamprou

- President of Greek Pharmaceutical Students’ Federation. ,

We used Conferience in our two latest events. It is a very useful application because the questions ran smoothly during the course of the event. Most of the participants evaluated the speakers and voted the questions they wanted to be answered. The contribution of the platform was significant to the success of our events.

How many times have you attended an event, where you didn’t know anyone? An event, where you couldn’t find the words to start a proper conversation and connect with others? Introducing yourself in the right way is key to making a good first impression; that’s what matters, because after all, first impressions are the most lasting. This is the first step to developing a circle of acquaintances, which can offer you new job opportunitis, along with interesting information about your field and also introduce you to people that can make you open new doors.

Our world is not yet back to normal, while contact and communication with other participants is even harder in virtual events. For that reason, you need to be updated on the ways, in which these virtual events have been fully adapted to your need for interconnection, offering you the right tools to achieve it.
Apart from the extra push that these tools offer you, here are some tips for an easier first step…

Prepare a “speech”.
Your first introduction should contain your full name, your company’s title or the field you aim for, as well as an important personality detail; a detail that should be able to make your new acquaintances remember you or have an interest in talking to you more. It could be something you admire, your job role or the reason you attended the event at the first place.

Use non-verbal communication
If you wish to make a great non-verbal first impression and make it clear that you want to greet someone, you need to get up straight to your feet, make eye contact, smile and initiate a handshake with your new acquaintance. You have to radiate certainty and confidence! You should enhance/dress up your speech with body language.

Be yourself!
No matter how many tips you follow or how much you have prepared for a meeting, nothing is more important and more awe-striking than being yourself! Confidence and a wide smile are the only “weapons” you need, if you want to start an interesting conversation.
We all more or less remember those days, when 24 hours never seemed enough to fit your busy agenda, while even the tightest of schedules couldn’t put everything in order. And sometimes, even if that tight schedule was actually enough, it was blocked by certain psychological factors – procrastination it is! Obviously, none of what I’m describing sounds unreasonable or surreal. You know you’ve got a problem, once these days turn into routine, instead of being occasional unpleasant memories…

The truth is, that the most important factor determining whether 24 hours are enough for you or not, is not so much your workload itself, but the way you manage and organize it. Under the mentality of “work smarter, not harder”, you will find down below some simple tips that can increase your efficiency, without leaving you exhausted.

Time Management
You need to know whether multitasking is actually helping you, or just wasting your time. Most of the time we dive into many things at once, hoping to save some time for the next task we have to complete. That way, however, we often end up wasting extra time working on multiple tasks, leaving them incomplete – at the best-case scenario - or chaotic – at the worst. One task at a time, with specific time limit is the safest way to carry through with our work, without setting our other responsibilities back.

Stop procrastinating
Procrastination, or “Acracy” (Akrasia) as it was called by Socrates and Aristotle, is basically our own refusal to comply, in practice, with what our logic commands us. Behavioral psychology interprets the phenomenon as the inability of our Present Self to empathize with our Future Self, which is the one setting all of our goals. There is a solution; It is called "temptation bundling". This strategy is all about allowing yourself to do some of your favorite things, only during the task you tend to postpone or after you’ve finished it. E.g. Buy your favorite ice cream only after you’ve finished the cover letter you had to prepare yesterday or do your pedicure while archiving the emails of the week.

To don’t list
We are all familiar with the “To do list”, and there’s no way you haven’t at some point made one your own. It is definitely a great solution to get organized and work passionately and full of optimism. However, many times, in our effort to improve our "To do list", we end up taking up useless hobbies and tasks that steal our time and energy from more important activities. Thus, the "To don’t list" focuses more on what would be best to avoid, in order to use your energy in a productive and creative way. The first bullet for a successful "To don’t list" is "Pointless scrolling on social media".
The pandemic turned everything upside down. Countries all over the world have been forced to adopt public healthpreventive measures. The influence in the workplace was also important. Due to this situation and the new measures that were imposed, most companies, having no other choice, implemented remote-work, in order to keep their employees healthy and safe.

Working from home isn’t always easy. Many employees feel stressed and often lose their productivity.
For this reason, listed below are some tips to ensure your employees productivity while working from home.

Communication is Everything
Communication between employees that work remotely, is important, especially during these difficult times. Whether you have daily calls or weekly group meetings, you should use video conferencing tools to keep in touch with your employee as if you were physically in the company.
As employees continue to adjust to remote work, consider giving them flexible working hours or extended deadlines to reduce their stress levels. Encourage employees to come to you if they are having difficulties and make sure they know you are there to support them. Asking your employees to get in contact with youwill clearly help you motivate them while they are working from home.

Company Transparency
The pandemic’s impact had as a result the de-manning in companies. Because of this, many employees feel that nothing about their career path is certain. That is why it is important as a company to restore the faith of your employees to the future of the company. To help your employeesregain their trust, you should continue to uphold your company values ​​and be transparent with them.
Present to the whole company data and graphs during meetings in order to show them where you stand at the present time and where to want to get. And make sure your company’s well performance is celebrated.Being honest with your employees and updating themconstantly will help restore their confidence and boost their motivation for the company.

Maintaining Communication between Employees
If your employees feel isolated while working from home, chances are their motivation and efficiency levels are constantly running low. Fortunately, technology allows you to help your employees stay connected, no matter where they are. From hosting virtual group meals and breaks to celebrating work anniversaries and birthdays, you can boost your employees’ morale by giving them opportunities to be motivated and interact with each other.

Prioritize the Employees’ Safety
As many companies start to re-open their offices, employers should make employee safety their top priority. From the distancingin offices to the disinfection of workplaces and the mandatory face masks, there are several precautions that companies must follow to keep their employees safe. Maintaining a safe work environment will ease the nerves of employees returning to the office so that they can focus on their work and therefore remain motivated and eager for work.

This year’s drastic changes have encouraged companies to redefine their relationship with their employees and their team relationships.
We are faced with a lot of important challenges. People, the most vital element of all teams, have to work remotely, all the while keeping their enthusiasm alive.
Especially during the holidays, all meetings, company celebrations and events were held in person. As we all remember, the team’s Christmas party was a meeting point for everyone and a chance to escape our busy routines…

Now, however, most employees have to work remotely and everything that comes with their working routine is now taking place at home.
At first, it may have seemed interesting, as it was something new to discover and adapt to as quickly as possible. During that first transitional period, everyone’s interest was maintained… but for how long?

Employees are less and less interested in attending the online meetings, something they previously used to look forward to. The interaction between colleagues is now exclusively online and most of the time, the feeling of togetherness may have started to fade.
It’s reasonable for the employers to run out of ideas to make remote work and company meetings more exciting. How can we cut this year’s Basil Pie (Vasilopita)?
How can we celebrate the arrival of the new year online?

Conferience makes 4 creative suggestions to help you keep your employees’ interest alive:

Organize out-of-company events
It’s pretty easy for employees to “get boggled” at their routine, especially now that they can’t communicate and interact with their colleagues, the way they used to while at the office. Organizing small, different online events every now and then (every two weeks, for instance) would be an interesting way to keep the team tight-knit.
For instance, there could be quizzes with a small prize, so that participating sounds more appealing, or online meetings, where everyone can discuss about last year’s memories and new year’s resolutions. It’s best if such discussions are kept loose and fun, so that the employees don’t mistake them for yet another work meeting that they are obligated to attend to.

Send small care packages for the holidays
This year, Christmas will be different for everyone. Every year, companies used to organize Christmas parties and pie cutting (Kopi Pitas) to celebrate the New Year, something employees always look forward to. This year, however, none of that can happen, since everyone is at home and gatherings are not allowed. What can happen, though, is organizing an online party and also sending small care-packages to the employees, so that you can open them simultaneously at the Zoom meeting.
The packages may consist of Christmas sweets, or even a piece of Basil Pie (Vasilopita) including, of course, the hidden coin, for the lucky one to find! Alternatively, you can organize a lottery with small gifts or a Christmas knowledge competition.

This year, interaction is what everyone misses the most! Care-packages will bring joy to your team members, keeping their spirits high after the holiday season.

Encourage personal relationships
All employees are not only professionals, but also humans. They need to develop and maintain human contact with their colleagues and perhaps discuss about their house routine, their thoughts and concerns.
Create an online communication environment, where your colleagues can feel free to share a part of their life with others. This way, a different form of human interaction and communication is achieved, so that employees don’t feel like 8-hour-straight-working robots, who don’t talk to anyone. Allow small breaks, so that they can rest and recharge their batteries.
In this context, a virtual lunch break or a break for coffee could take place, as if we were at the office. That way, employees can discuss while eating their lunch together.


Reward
Recognition is the simplest way to motivate and raise the team’s confidence. Sometimes, concentrating and being productive and efficient while working at home is a pretty challenging task for team members. Therefore, it is very important to reward our colleagues, as well as the teams that met our goals, despite adversity. And once that happens, they all need to hear a “good job”, so that they keep on being efficient.
Of course, it’d be even more helpful, if all employees participated in this recognition process, so that they can take it as an example and try to be more alert and aware of how important their contribution to the company is.
In conclusion, everyone is going through a very difficult time; a time of adjustment that requires creativity, new ideas and innovation. Some small changes can help make our everyday life interesting, keeping the team’s spirits high!
As we all know, COVID-19 has changed our world -as well as the world of events- dramatically! Until now, everything would happen in person, but suddenly, we have to adjust to a new, virtual reality. What does this mean? No more face-to-face events or hanging out with our beloved ones, our colleagues and our clients.
Our new reality comes with online meetings, conferences, remote awards, as well as many video games! However, if we want to adjust to this new dimension of events, we have to take some basic steps first…
So, what are the 5 easy steps for someone to enter that virtual world of events?

Organize it properly!
The first step for a successful event is getting to know your audience. You have to know who you’re addressing to, what works best for your audience and what they’d want to see from you. Your event should be adapted to your audience, for a greater impact.
Once you’ve learned everything about your audience, all you have to do is choose your ideal event type. You can choose from a conference to an internal meeting, an award planning or even a live concert. Choose between a live video or a pre-recorded presentation. (Τip: live presentations are always more direct and preferable!)

Choose the platform that works best for you!
You can use different platforms, depending on the size or the type of the event. Not all available platforms are suitable for all events. Will it be local or global? Will it have integrated social media or not? Will it be able to host 10 or 1000 people? These are all questions that need to be answered before choosing the platform to use. Some of them are:
-Zoom
-Cisco Webex Events
-Microsoft Teams
-YouTube
-Facebook

Make your event interactive!
Is there anything better for the participants than being able to interact with the speakers and with each other? Give your audience voice, by making your event more interactive, but also more…fun!
Quizzes, Puzzles, Live Polls, Q&As and much more that can make your event special and instantly make it more attractive for someone who wants to attend to it. These features will make your event stand out among the rest… which leads to the next step.

Promote it!
Why choose your event? What sets it apart from all the other similar ones? Find what makes your event unique and promote it properly. Use event sites and social media, so that it can be seen by as many people as possible. If you want your event to make an impact, promote it the right way, using the right tools. That way, people can know about your event, be attracted to it and choose it, over others.


All set!
If you follow all the above simple steps, then you’re almost set for your event. Now there are services, available for anything you need for virtual events, such as Zoom for videos and Kahoot for quizzes, among many others, depending on your needs and on the way you want to design your event.
At the same time, if you want more features within a single application, Conferience offers all the features you might need for any kind of event. Video sharing using Zoom, Webex, Vimeo, your own streaming or Conferience video call, as well as simultaneous use of many interaction tools such as Agenda, Quiz, Live Voting, Media Wall and more.
No stress and a good strategy are all you need for an unforgettable event… even if it’s way out of the ordinary!

Sometimes, concentrating and being productive and efficient while working at home is a pretty challenging task for team members. Therefore, it is very important to reward our colleagues, as well as the teams that met our goals, despite adversity. And once that happens, they all need to hear a “good job”, so that they keep on being efficient.
Of course, it’d be even more helpful, if all employees participated in this recognition process, so that they can take it as an example and try to be more alert and aware of how important their contribution to the company is.
In conclusion, everyone is going through a very difficult time; a time of adjustment that requires creativity, new ideas and innovation. Some small changes can help make our everyday life interesting, keeping the team’s spirits high!
As we all know, COVID-19 has changed our world -as well as the world of events- dramatically! Until now, everything would happen in person, but suddenly, we have to adjust to a new, virtual reality. What does this mean? No more face-to-face events or hanging out with our beloved ones, our colleagues and our clients.
Our new reality comes with online meetings, conferences, remote awards, as well as many video games! However, if we want to adjust to this new dimension of events, we have to take some basic steps first…
So, what are the 5 easy steps for someone to enter that virtual world of events?
Organize it properly!
The first step for a successful event is getting to know your audience. You have to know who you’re addressing to, what works best for your audience and what they’d want to see from you. Your event should be adapted to your audience, for a greater impact.
Once you’ve learned everything about your audience, all you have to do is choose your ideal event type. You can choose from a conference to an internal meeting, an award planning or even a live concert. Choose between a live video or a pre-recorded presentation. (Τip: live presentations are always more direct and preferable!)
Choose the platform that works best for you!
You can use different platforms, depending on the size or the type of the event. Not all available platforms are suitable for all events. Will it be local or global? Will it have integrated social media or not? Will it be able to host 10 or 1000 people? These are all questions that need to be answered before choosing the platform to use. Some of them are:
-Zoom
-Cisco Webex Events
-Microsoft Teams
-YouTube
-Facebook
Make your event interactive!
Is there anything better for the participants than being able to interact with the speakers and with each other? Give your audience voice, by making your event more interactive, but also more…fun!
Quizzes, Puzzles, Live Polls, Q&As and much more that can make your event special and instantly make it more attractive for someone who wants to attend to it. These features will make your event stand out among the rest… which leads to the next step.
Promote it!
Why choose your event? What sets it apart from all the other similar ones? Find what makes your event unique and promote it properly. Use event sites and social media, so that it can be seen by as many people as possible. If you want your event to make an impact, promote it the right way, using the right tools. That way, people can know about your event, be attracted to it and choose it, over others.
All set!
If you follow all the above simple steps, then you’re almost set for your event. Now there are services, available for anything you need for virtual events, such as Zoom for videos and Kahoot for quizzes, among many others, depending on your needs and on the way you want to design your event.
At the same time, if you want more features within a single application, Conferience offers all the features you might need for any kind of event. Video sharing using Zoom, Webex, Vimeo, your own streaming or Conferience video call, as well as simultaneous use of many interaction tools such as Agenda, Quiz, Live Voting, Media Wall and more.
No stress and a good strategy are all you need for an unforgettable event… even if it’s way out of the ordinary!

discovered_links.clean_content:
Event Management Platform
  • Home
  • Pricing
  • Blog
  • English Ελληνικά Deutsch Français Pусский Српски العربية

FAQ

What is Conferience?
keyboard_arrow_down
Conferience is the ideal  web and native app  for event organizers,
presenters and researchers all over the world. Engage any audience in  any kind of event, facilitating direct interaction among audiences. It is excellent for any kind of event,   including lectures, presentations, conferences, forums, trade shows, polls, training courses, seminars, workshops, school classes, universities, focus groups, research & internal (corporate executive) meetings.

Enjoy more than 30 features, plus several customized features in one app!
Who can use it?
keyboard_arrow_down
@ events : Event organizers of any type, such as festivals, forums, conferences, corporate events and trade shows.
@ work : Management teams, HR, Marketing, CRM, Sales, Logistics and other departments in your organization now have  the power to engage your/their employees in different ways.
@ presentations : Speakers, teachers, professors, instructors, lecturers, students, facilitators.
@ market research : Market researchers, focus groups, companies, and anyone who would like to collect replies from their audiences.
Why buy Conferience?
keyboard_arrow_down
All in one. You have the power of many solutions in one platform.

Valuable engagement tools for less money. The best price in the market, perfect if you don't want  to derail from your budget!

Ideal for events, workplaces, presentations and market research.
How to motivate and engage your participants?
keyboard_arrow_down
With a big array of tools, from anonymity to registration, you enable the participants to express their deeper thoughts, ideas and concerns, quickly and effectively.
How do I create  an account in oder to setup  my first event?
keyboard_arrow_down
Create your account by choosing the appropriate plan for you.    You can setup your first event either at CMS (Content Management System) or  by using our event templates.
How do I access an event if I am in the audience?
keyboard_arrow_down
Go on www.conferience.com using any device (from PC to tablets or any type of smartphone). On the landing page, you will see: FOR ATTENDEES. In the field asking for event id , type your event id .
What’s the difference between Web app versus Native app?
keyboard_arrow_down
A Web app enables you to navigate in an application without any native app installation. All you need to do is  type the URL in the browser of your device. It is a reliable and easy way to present your event, without forcing  your attendees to install anything.

A native app is the application you download from the Apple store or Google Play.  Conferience can be used either from your browser or by directly downloading the app from Apple or Google stores.
Is an internet connection required to use Conferience?
keyboard_arrow_down
Conferience is an online solution. Therefore, users must be connected either to Wi-Fi or to their mobile providers.
For which platforms is Conferience available?
keyboard_arrow_down
The web-app is available on all browsers (Chrome, Safari, Firefox and Microsoft Edge) through the URL www.conferience.com . Conferience is also available at the Apple and Google Play stores, where participants can download the app on their phones and receive notifications.
What is the event id?
keyboard_arrow_down
The event id is either text, a series of numbers or a combination of both, users have to type at the “For Attendees” field  in order to gain access  to an event as an attendee.
As an organizer, researcher or speaker, how do I  gain access to the Content Management System?
keyboard_arrow_down
Using any device (PC,tablet or any type of smartphone), go on www.conferience.com and login to your account from the “FOR ORGANIZERS” field. The prerequisite is to create an account under a plan.
How can I setup an event and manage it before, at, and after the event?
keyboard_arrow_down
You can do it via the Content Management System . You can create the agenda, set up polls and speakers’ profiles as well as sponsors, event and speakers’ evaluations, download your data and  see all the graphs. It is the dashboard from which  you can control everything.
What is the “Questions” feature?
keyboard_arrow_down
Attendees can post their questions  to a speaker,the coordinator or the panel in general as well as upvote other questions submitted by other attendees by simply clicking (Like) on the thumbs up button. By default, the questions with the most likes are being displayed on top of the screen.

What is the “Agenda” feature?
keyboard_arrow_down
The “ Agenda ” feature allows the attendees to find all the information needed regarding the full program of the event: the time schedule, multi-sessions, the list of speakers as well as a short profile and contact details for each of them.

Can I promote my Sponsors?
keyboard_arrow_down
Yes, you can fully expose your Sponsors and Exhibitors . Each one will be listed on the “Sponsors” menu of the app. Attendees will be able to see the list of your Sponsors, their logos and access their websites directly from the app.
What is the “Event Evaluation” feature?
keyboard_arrow_down
You can eliminate the costs of printing questionnaires for the Evaluation of your Event. Add your questions the same way you added the Poll questions. Questions, such as “Did you like the venue?”, “Did you like the catering?”, “Did you like the atmosphere?” can be given as part of the digital evaluation form. You can get already set  questions from our library of questions/templates regarding different industries.

What is the “Speakers’ Evaluation” feature?
keyboard_arrow_down
Attendees can evaluate  speakers and panels of the event directly from the agenda, through a "5-star rating" system. They can also send comments. Thus, event organizers are able to find out  whether their speakers made a difference or not.
Can I place my Logo? “Custom Branding” feature?
keyboard_arrow_down
Of course! It is the best way to gain brand awareness. You can host your logo on the header of the app.
What is the “Raffle” feature?
keyboard_arrow_down
Your attendees enter their name and e-mail to participate in a virtual draw to win a prize (ticket, tablet etc.).
Some competitors promote "UNLIMITED" audience size. What about Conferience?
keyboard_arrow_down
At Conferience, we strongly believe in transparency. No hidden costs, secret  terms etc. What you see is what you get!

While  doing your research, always    be on the lookout for eye-catching terms like " UNLIMITED ". There is always a limit and it’s nice to know it from the beginning .
What is the “Voting” feature?
keyboard_arrow_down
The “ Voting ” feature provides users with the option to answer questions on the topic of each presentation or  survey. For example: Did you like XY’s talk? What do you  think about a specific issue? etc.

They can also participate in a quiz and gain points by  giving the correct  answer at the best time. Presenters/organizers can control the flow of questions by choosing either "Presenter" or "Audience" pace.
What type of questions does the “Voting” feature include?
keyboard_arrow_down
You can choose among the following types of questions:
  • Likert scale
  • Multiple choices
  • Multi-multiple choices
  • Segmentation
  • Statements
  • Collection of personal data
  • Open questions
  • Rating
  • Stars and many others
  • Image choice
  • Reactions
  • Matrix
Do I get reports and infographics?
keyboard_arrow_down
Yes, you can download general XL, detailed Xl of each voting and a pdf infographic with all the statistics, data and all visualizations.  You can also download all the graphs in PowerPoint files   that are readyfor presentation.
For how long is my event available on Conferience?
keyboard_arrow_down
Your event app will be available for the users of the app (attendees) to utilize for 7 days .  The event organizer can have access  to the CMS (Content Management System)anytime in order to retain any information/analytics for as long as  they retain an account with us.

Should you need more days for your attendees to use the app, you can buy extra weeks. The maximum duration of usage is one month. For more than one month, please contact us at info@conferience.com


What do I need to check as an event organizer before the event? Do I have to contact the IT department of the venue where I organize my event?
keyboard_arrow_down
YES. Before using Conferience at  any event, you need to call the IT department of the venue and ask whether their access points can accommodate concurrently (for the beginning of the event and sporadically during the event) the number of users/participants  expected to attend. The reason  is that, if at the time of the event participants are asked to   login to Conferience, the access points of the venue must be able to accommodate all the traffic (for example 100, 300, 1000 devices or more concurrently).

If participants have access through their mobiles’ operators, you must check before the event, whether the signal of the operators is strong enough to provide access without problems.


Do I have to sign a year contract to use your platform?
keyboard_arrow_down
According to our pricing policy, we charge per event.
What do your customers say about your services?
keyboard_arrow_down
Feel free to check our clients' testimonials.
Do you count your customers’ feedback?
keyboard_arrow_down
Sure  It is the way we improve our services and features.
How frequently do you update your platform and app.
keyboard_arrow_down
We update our features every day.
Do you offer registration?
keyboard_arrow_down
Yes, we offer event registration  as well as session/workshop registration .
Do you charge per registration?
keyboard_arrow_down
The Registration feature is included in the paid plans.

Regarding paid tickets, there is a flat extra fee of  $0.50 per ticket, no matter the price of the ticket. Whether the ticket costs 5€  or 500€, the flat extra fee remains at $0.50.

You also have  to pay 3rd parties, such as Stripe and Paypal, for processing your ticket fees.


When I use the Registration feature, can I set capacity limits for each session?
keyboard_arrow_down
Yes, you can set capacity limits for each session. You can create a waiting list when those limits are reached.
Can I use different types of tickets?
keyboard_arrow_down
You can create different types of tickets.
Is the registration form customizable?
keyboard_arrow_down
The registration form is fully customizable. It  is very flexible and it offers  a variety of options and input fields.
Do you provide email authentication via registration?
keyboard_arrow_down
Yes, we do, so as to increase security and authenticate the attendees' registration process.
Can I send etickets to my attendees?
keyboard_arrow_down
Sure. You can have Apple Wallet, jpg and QR code tickets. You can alsoadd them to different calendars.
What are the 3rd party payment gateways you use?
keyboard_arrow_down
We use Stripe and Paypal. You need to create an account with them and later on connect it to the CMS (Content Management System), and more specifically  the Payments and Tickets section , in Confierence,
Can I create bulk vouchers through your platform (for paid events with Registration)?
keyboard_arrow_down
Yes, you can create vouchers in order to provide them to  the attendees you choose.
Can I import and export contact lists under the Registration feature into your platform?
keyboard_arrow_down
You can easily import and export lists on the platform.
How does the Check in take place at the event? How can I scan Conferience QR codes (for event organizers)?
keyboard_arrow_down
You download ConferienceQR from the Apple or the Google Play store in order to use it for the check in of your attendees. You only need  the event id and a token to gain access into the ConferienceQR app. There is no extra cost . It is very easy to use.
Do you provide an RSVP (répondez s'il vous plaît, meaning "please respond.")?
keyboard_arrow_down
Yes, we do offer RSVP.
Can I create an event page (microsite) for the purposes of the event?
keyboard_arrow_down
Yes, we provide an event page (microsite) creator with text editors and other elements  for your first page with information regarding the event.
It is an excellent way to quickly promote  your event while including only the information you want to deliver to your potential attendees.
Do I need any technical knowledge to set up the event page (microsite)?
keyboard_arrow_down
Not at all. You do not need any technical knowledge to create it. It is easy and user friendly.
Can I embed images in the event page (microsite) without needing a developer?
keyboard_arrow_down
Yes, you can do so.
Do you charge extra if I ask you to set up the event page (microsite) or the event app of my event?
keyboard_arrow_down
Yes, having your event set up from our team, costs  extra .

Please contact us and describe your case at info@conferience.com.

Do you provide physical or online support at my event?
keyboard_arrow_down
Yes, we do provide physical or online (via skype) support at your event. That costs extra .

Please contact us for more details at info@conferience.com.


Can I clone (duplicate) a past event?
keyboard_arrow_down
Yes, you can clone (duplicate) a past event with just one click.
Are the event site, the web-app and the Content Management System (CMS) mobile responsive?
keyboard_arrow_down
Yes, on every kind of device and monitor size.
Is your platform GDPR compliant?
keyboard_arrow_down
The platform is fully GDPR compliant.

Can I send real-time push notifications to attendees via the event app?
keyboard_arrow_down
Yes, as long as attendees have downloaded Conferience native app, a notification will be shown on the locked screen.

Web app users can see notifications only  when they   login to the browser.

Can I edit the look and  feel of the event app myself?
keyboard_arrow_down
You can edit the look and  feel of the app by changing icons using either our icons library or by uploading your own.
Does the Networking feature support  one on one messaging?
keyboard_arrow_down
Yes,  you can chat one  on one with other participants.


Can attendees  use the "My Agenda" feature?
keyboard_arrow_down
Attendees can  use the "My Agenda" feature, where they add the topics, speakers and panel they would like to attend.
Does your event app support live polls and surveys? If so, is  there an additional fee to use this feature?
keyboard_arrow_down
You can create surveys, polls and quizzes at no extra cost, if it is included in  your package.
Can I promote sponsors and exhibitors?
keyboard_arrow_down
Sponsors can be promoted via the dedicated "Sponsors" feature, pop ups and announcements.
Will I be able to self-learn the platform using help tutorials and step by step guides?
keyboard_arrow_down
The platform is very easy to use. You can set up your event, networking, agenda, questions, surveys and other features quickly.
What methods can I use to contact support?
keyboard_arrow_down
You can reach us via email, telephone or skype. There is always the option for remote training with extra cost.
Does your Networking feature match event attendees with one another?
keyboard_arrow_down
Networking system matches skills of attendees and filters various criteria.
Does Conferience share my data with third parties?
keyboard_arrow_down
Conferience does not sell, trade or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties in any manner that could be harmful, dangerous or violating your privacy.
Do you collect IP addresses of the participants? Can you share IP addresses with us if we request you to do so?
keyboard_arrow_down
No, we don't collect IP addresses from the participants.
Does Conferience provide anonymity for its users?
keyboard_arrow_down
Yes, it does. When you access the event, you only type  the event id. Thus, there is no personal information required,  so participation to surveys and other features remains anonymoys.

However, this  does not apply to events demanding registration (separate feature) where personal information can be connected with your engagement activity.
Why buy Conferience?
All in one. You have the power of many solutions in one platform. Valuable engagement tools for less money. The best price in the market, perfect if you don't want to derail from your budget! Ideal for events, workplace, presentations and market research.
@Events:
Event organizers of any type, such as festivals, forums, conferences, corporate events and trade shows.
@Work:
Management teams, HR, Marketing, CRM, Sales, Logistics, and other departments in your organization have now the power to engage your employees in different ways.
@Presentations:
Speakers, teachers, professors, instructors, lecturers, students, facilitators.
@Market Research:
Market researchers, focus groups, companies, and anyone who would like to collect responses from their audiences.
How to motivate and engage your participants?
With a big array of tools, from anonymity to registration, you let your people express their deeper thoughts, ideas and concerns, quickly and effectively.

Event Management Platform

  • Pricing
  • Blog
  • English Ελληνικά Deutsch Français Pусский Српски العربية

Terms of service

TERMS OF SERVICE

Updated on the 24th of April 2020

Welcome to Conferience. We invite you to access our website and use the Conferience Services, but please note that the usage of the site’s services is subject to your review and agreement with these Terms of Use. These Terms of Use describe in detail your rights as well as ours regarding the Use of Conferience, so please review these terms carefully.

INTRODUCTION

Conferience Ltd . (“Conferience”, “we” or “us”) provides an event management solution to help Event Organizers or Organizers (“Clients”) provide various tools and solutions ("Services"), through a cloud-based platform (“Platform”), that enable real-time active engagement of Participants/App Users (“Users”) at any kind of event, either physically or virtually.

“You” refers to both Event Organizers and Users, unless specified otherwise.

Who is Subject to These Terms

These Terms apply to your use of the Services when you access the Services as a Client or as an App User. By ordering or using the Services, you expressly acknowledge and agree that you are entering into a legal agreement with Conferience and have understood and agreed to comply with and be legally bound by the terms and conditions of this Agreement (“Services Agreement”).

What is a cookie?

A cookie is a small data file that is sent to your browser from our servers and stored on your computer's hard disk and smart devices. Session cookies disappear from your computer when you turn off your web browser or your computer. We use persistent cookies, so as to have a better understanding of how you use Conferience.

Conferience is committed to ensuring that your privacy is protected. Should we ask you to provide certain information by which you can be identified when using this website, you can be assured that it will only be used in accordance with this privacy statement.

We use the information to compile reports, to help us improve the site and to deliver content that is more relevant to you and your interests. This information may be used to deliver targeted advertising or to limit the number of times you see an advertisement. It also helps us measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.

  • Load balancing users into our servers.

  • To remember some actions on our site and the web-app (through your browser).

  • To keep your contact information, including name, company, physical address(es) and email address, for the Content Management system.

Overall, cookies help us provide you with a better website experience, by enabling us to monitor which pages you find useful and which you do not. A cookie in no way gives us access to your computer or any information about you, other than the data you choose to share with us.

You can choose to accept or decline cookies. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify your browser settings to decline cookies, if you prefer. However, that may prevent you from taking full advantage of the website.

COOKIES
We use cookies to provide the best experience through our services.
What is a cookie?
A cookie is a small data file that is sent to your browser from our servers and stored on your computer's hard disk and smart devices. Session cookies disappear from your computer when you turn off your web browser or your computer. We use persistent cookies, so as to have a better understanding of how you use Conferience.
Conferience uses and protects any information that you may provide us with while using this website.
Conferience is committed to ensuring that your privacy is protected. Should we ask you to provide certain information by which you can be identified when using this website, you can be assured that it will only be used in accordance with this privacy statement.
We may collect the following information through cookies for the following operations:
For Google analytics, in order for them to provide us with aggregated data around usage and web traffic. We use the information to compile reports, to help us improve the site and to deliver content that is more relevant to you and your interests. This information may be used to deliver targeted advertising or to limit the number of times you see an advertisement. It also helps us measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.
Load balancing users into our servers.
To remember some actions on our site and the web-app (through your browser).
To keep your contact information, including name, company, physical address(es) and email address, for the Content Management system.
Overall, cookies help us provide you with a better website experience, by enabling us to monitor which pages you find useful and which you do not. A cookie in no way gives us access to your computer or any information about you, other than the data you choose to share with us.
You can choose to accept or decline cookies. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify your browser settings to decline cookies, if you prefer. However, that may prevent you from taking full advantage of the website.
